description: Returns the details about a location to which you can ship the disks associated with an import or export job. A location is an Azure region.

accept_language.description: Specifies the preferred language for the response.

id.description: Specifies the resource identifier of the location.

name.description: Specifies the name of the location. Use List Locations to get all supported locations.

type.description: Specifies the type of the location.

location_name.description: The name of the location. For example, West US or westus.

api_version.description: Specifies the API version to use for this request.
